name: segundas-vias
description: Painel local para emissao de 2 vias (JSON/XML) com atalho na bandeja.

scripts.ui:build: echo 'ui: build disabled — ui/ts is ignored; use npm run ui:bundle'
scripts.ui:watch: echo 'ui: watch disabled — ui/ts is ignored'
scripts.ui:bundle: npm run ui:copy-data && esbuild src/acts/nascimento/nascimento.ts src/acts/casamento/casamento.ts src/acts/obito/obito.ts --bundle --format=esm --target=es2019 --outdir=ui/js --entry-names=[name].bundle --sourcemap=external
scripts.ui:bundle:watch: npm run ui:copy-data && esbuild src/acts/nascimento/nascimento.ts src/acts/casamento/casamento.ts src/acts/obito/obito.ts --bundle --format=esm --target=es2019 --outdir=ui/js --entry-names=[name].bundle --sourcemap=external --watch
scripts.freq:dev: npm run build:once && nodemon --watch src/server --ext ts --exec "npm run build:once && node dist-src/server/frequencyServer.js"
scripts.go: npm run build && npm run ui:bundle && npm run dev
scripts.ci:quality: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && npm run prune && npm run depcheck && npm run bundle:analyze
scripts.verify: npm test && npm run ui:bundle && node tools/verify-repo.js
